comments.text:
Many times when I want to send/email somebody a URL, I would like to add a caption to it. Most time the best caption for URL will be its pages title. But there is no easy way to get that. So I do view-source and copy title from there.

It would have been easy if you can add an option in tabbar context menu to copy the pages title.
comments.creator: BijuMailList@GMail.Com
comments.raw_text:
Many times when I want to send/email somebody a URL, I would like to add a caption to it. Most time the best caption for URL will be its pages title. But there is no easy way to get that. So I do view-source and copy title from there.

comments.author: BijuMailList@GMail.Com
